items.question: Is it really free to start?
items.answer: Yes! The free plan gives you access to AI scanning, weight tracking, and offline mode. No credit card required to get started.

items.question: Does the app work offline?
items.answer: Absolutely. LOWIS is a Progressive Web App (PWA) designed to work without connection. Your data syncs automatically when you're online.

items.question: How is LOWIS different from other apps?
items.answer: LOWIS isn't just a calorie calculator. It's a complete 13-phase system based on nutritional science, with weekly symptom evaluation and automatic plan adjustment.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription anytime. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Your data is encrypted and stored securely. We're GDPR compliant and never sell your personal information.
